# StringExtensions.ToEnumByDescription&lt;T&gt; method

Converts string to enum object by emun description attribute.

```csharp
public static T ToEnumByDescription<T>(this string description)
    where T : struct
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of enum |
| description | Description of target enum value |

## Return Value

Returns enum object
